Name: Three Kingdoms VR - Jade Knight (光之三國VR - 青龍騎)
About the game: Three Kingdoms VR - Jade Knight is a fully immersive VR action experience developed by InterServ International. You ARE the legendary knight Guan Yu of the Han dynasty. With the Dragon Crescent Blade in your hand, you will dash, slash, clash your way across the battlefield on your royal mount The Red Hare, and face-off with one of your greatest adversary in an epic final boss battle!
